Name: Fairytale Figurine: Superglue
Desc: An ornamental model comprised of many components, which can be placed on a "Good Shelf" for display.\nThis superglue's powerful adhesive properties can stick all people and things together with ease, making separation tricky once it dries. They said that Xudi once tried to make this model fire off a powerful adhesive, only to abandon the idea after some tragic experiences on the part of the modeling artist...
